objects.description: [Zeus Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0330) queries the system's keyboard mapping to determine the language used on the system. It will terminate execution if it detects LANG_RUSSIAN, LANG_BELARUSIAN, LANG_KAZAK, or LANG_UKRAINIAN.(Citation: Talos Zeus Panda Nov 2017)

external_references.description: Brumaghin, E., et al. (2017, November 02). Poisoning the Well: Banking Trojan Targets Google Search Results. Retrieved November 5, 2018.
